name: Lunch Box
description:
Story
To protect the village from the purple animals that try to eat it like a packed lunch, our animal friends stood up with their guns.
Fight your enemies right now with supplies falling from the sky and achieve them. Only! Blood thirst and ruthlessness for survival!
Win the battlefield and survive!

Game function

  • You can purchase items from the shop.
  • You can enhance items in the Helster Forge.
  • Save money in the bank and earn interest to get stronger.
  • Collect set items to enjoy stronger effects.

Character introduction

Our pink-ass Ping Tong is the first intrepid rabbit to take a gun to defend the village.
Please play with love.

Discord

Come here to communicate. https://discord.gg/ecz4pxsMCE
